things-to-do.title: Things To Do in Queenstown
things-to-do.description: Discover the best activities and experiences in Queenstown. From adventure sports to scenic cruises, walking trails to ski fields, there's something for everyone in the adventure capital of New Zealand.

things-to-do/outdoor-activities/walking-.title: Walking & Hiking in Queenstown
things-to-do/outdoor-activities/walking-.description: Explore Queenstown's stunning landscapes on foot. From easy lakeside strolls to challenging alpine adventures, our trails offer breathtaking views of mountains, lakes, and native bush.

things-to-do/outdoor-activities/walking-.title: Short Walks in Queenstown
things-to-do/outdoor-activities/walking-.description: Perfect for those short on time, these walks range from 30 minutes to 2 hours and showcase the best of Queenstown's natural beauty.

things-to-do/outdoor-activities/walking-.title: Day Walks in Queenstown
things-to-do/outdoor-activities/walking-.description: Full day adventures for experienced hikers. These tracks take 3-8 hours and reward with stunning alpine vistas.

things-to-do/adventure-activities.title: Adventure Activities in Queenstown
things-to-do/adventure-activities.description: Get your adrenaline pumping in the adventure capital of the world. Bungy jumping, skydiving, jet boating and more await the thrill-seekers.

things-to-do/adventure-activities/bungy-.title: Bungy, Swing & Zip in Queenstown
things-to-do/adventure-activities/bungy-.description: Take the leap! Queenstown is the birthplace of commercial bungy jumping and home to some of the world's most thrilling jump sites.

things-to-do/adventure-activities/indoor.title: Indoor Thrills in Queenstown
things-to-do/adventure-activities/indoor.description: Rain or shine, enjoy exciting indoor activities from escape rooms to indoor skydiving and gaming experiences.

things-to-do/biking.title: Biking in Queenstown
things-to-do/biking.description: World-class mountain biking and scenic cycling trails. From beginner-friendly paths along the lakefront to challenging downhill tracks.

things-to-do/biking/bike-hire.title: Bike Hire in Queenstown
things-to-do/biking/bike-hire.description: Rent high-quality bikes to explore Queenstown at your own pace. E-bikes, mountain bikes, and road bikes available.

things-to-do/family-fun.title: Family Fun in Queenstown
things-to-do/family-fun.description: Queenstown is a fantastic family destination with activities for all ages. Create lasting memories with kid-friendly adventures.

things-to-do/shopping.title: Shopping in Queenstown
things-to-do/shopping.description: From boutique stores to outdoor gear specialists, discover unique New Zealand souvenirs and quality goods in Queenstown's retail scene.

things-to-do/skiing-and-snowboarding.title: Skiing & Snowboarding in Queenstown
things-to-do/skiing-and-snowboarding.description: Home to world-renowned ski fields, Queenstown transforms into a winter wonderland from June to October.

things-to-do/skiing-and-snowboarding/ski.title: Ski Fields near Queenstown
things-to-do/skiing-and-snowboarding/ski.description: Four world-class ski fields within easy reach of Queenstown: Coronet Peak, The Remarkables, Cardrona, and Treble Cone.

things-to-do/golf/golf-courses.title: Golf Courses in Queenstown
things-to-do/golf/golf-courses.description: Play golf surrounded by stunning mountain and lake scenery. Queenstown boasts some of New Zealand's most scenic courses.

things-to-do/events.title: Events in Queenstown
things-to-do/events.description: From world-class sporting events to vibrant festivals, there's always something happening in Queenstown.

things-to-do/events/event-calendar.title: Event Calendar - Queenstown
things-to-do/events/event-calendar.description: Plan your visit around Queenstown's exciting calendar of events, festivals, and activities throughout the year.

accommodation.title: Accommodation in Queenstown
accommodation.description: From luxury lodges to budget-friendly hostels, find the perfect place to stay in Queenstown. Wake up to stunning mountain and lake views.

accommodation/hotels-and-resorts.title: Hotels & Resorts in Queenstown
accommodation/hotels-and-resorts.description: Experience world-class hospitality in Queenstown's finest hotels and resorts, offering premium amenities and stunning views.

accommodation/serviced-apartments.title: Serviced Apartments in Queenstown
accommodation/serviced-apartments.description: Self-contained apartments perfect for families and longer stays. Enjoy home comforts with hotel services.

accommodation/lodges-and-retreats.title: Lodges & Retreats in Queenstown
accommodation/lodges-and-retreats.description: Escape to exclusive lodges and peaceful retreats surrounded by nature. Perfect for a romantic getaway or wellness retreat.

accommodation/motels.title: Motels in Queenstown
accommodation/motels.description: Comfortable and convenient motel accommodation in Queenstown. Great value with easy parking and access to town.

places-to-eat-and-drink.title: Places to Eat & Drink in Queenstown
places-to-eat-and-drink.description: From award-winning restaurants to cosy cafes, craft breweries to world-class wineries, Queenstown's food and drink scene is thriving.

places-to-eat-and-drink/restaurants.title: Restaurants in Queenstown
places-to-eat-and-drink/restaurants.description: Dine with a view at Queenstown's best restaurants. From fine dining to casual eateries, discover diverse cuisines with local flavours.

places-to-eat-and-drink/cafes-and-bakeri.title: Cafes & Bakeries in Queenstown
places-to-eat-and-drink/cafes-and-bakeri.description: Start your day with excellent coffee and fresh pastries at Queenstown's vibrant cafe scene. Great for brunch and light lunches.

places-to-eat-and-drink/pubs-bars-and-cl.title: Pubs, Bars & Clubs in Queenstown
places-to-eat-and-drink/pubs-bars-and-cl.description: Experience Queenstown's legendary nightlife. From craft beer bars to late-night clubs, there's always a good time to be had.
